messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Behavior Question
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/27/2000 8:45:45 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Hi Dawn, Love and Logic is shorthand for a book called Parenting with Love and Logic by
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/27/2000 8:45:45 AM Central Daylight Time,
NumoAstro@... writes:

> Hi Michelle in DE
>
> What's Love and Logic... I've missed a few digests as we were away and
> decided I had too many e-mails to read so deleted a whole bunch...
>
> Dawn F
> Tucson, AZ

Hi Dawn,

Love and Logic is shorthand for a book called Parenting with Love and Logic
by Foster Cline and Jim Fay. The book is based on the premise that our goal
is to raise responsible children into adulthood, and that we do this by
giving our children as much control over their lives as we are comfortable
with and the freedom to experience the consequences of their actions.

Carron
